00063 #define CHIPMUNK_ARBITER_GET_SHAPES(arb, a, b) ChipmunkShape *a, *b; { \
00064   cpShape *shapeA, *shapeB; \
00065   cpArbiterGetShapes(arb, &shapeA, &shapeB); \
00066   a = shapeA->data; b = shapeB->data; \
00067 }

00110 // TODO these might be a really bad idea as they will not call subclass methods.
00111 // The following two methods use the [shape data] object as the collision handler.
00112 // In order to cache the method lookups, it needs to know the class of the object.
00113 // This means that [shape data] objects _must_ be a direct instance of klass and never a subclass.
00114 // See OneWay.m for an example.
00115 
00117 - (void)addShapeAHandler:(Class)klass

00119   begin:(SEL)begin
00120   preSolve:(SEL)preSolve
00121   postSolve:(SEL)postSolve
00122   separate:(SEL)separate
00123  __attribute__((deprecated));
00124
